Text: Why are the BNP so against settlers in Britain, and so much in favour of British settlers in Ireland?  Seems a tad inconsistent to say the least.

Sounds like the same old distressing story of human since we left the trees & moved into caves.
CanÂ´t see why Britain should be different?
British settlers in Ireland? Do you mean the British army going over there to stop them beating the shit out of each other?
